metadata.title: Paxrac 3D Galaxy Queen Comforter Set (90''x90''), 3 Pieces All Season Down Alternative Comforter Set (1 Galaxy Blue Comforter, 2 Pillowcases), Universal Outer Space Bedding Set, Microfiber Comforter
features: Reversible 3D Galaxy Pattern: What is the feeling of sleeping in mysterious galaxy? Paxrac 3D galaxy comforter set is designed for fans about universe. A universe cloud background matching with galaxy pattern, this queen comforter is suitable for adults, kids or anyone who is curious about the universe.

Soft and Durable: Paxrac galaxy blue comforter set is made of 100% soft microfiber. Breathable, comfortable and lightweight. Soft material with 300 GSM filling keeps you warm and cozy for all seasons. The reactive printing technology makes the galaxy pattern and the color vivid, attractive and fade-resistant.

Exquisite Workmanship: This queen size bedding sets masterpiece crafted with durable hems and quilting stitching, giving it excellent longevity. Paxrac unique stitching craftsmanship keeps the alternative comforter's filling in place and distributed evenly, and prevent the filling from moving around or clumping together.

Easy Care and Pet Friendly: Machine washable in the gentle cycle with cold water separately. Air dry or tumble dry on low heat. Please do not bleach. Our bed comforter set doesn't attract your pet hair. Holding up to dog/cat paws and dog/cat hair brushes off easily. Since the galaxy comforter is packaged in a vacuum bag, it is highly recommended that the comforter be baked in the sun and tapped gently during baking for fluffy.

Size & Measurement: Twin: 1 Comforter (66x90 inches) and 1 Pillowcase (20x26 inches). Full: 1 Comforter (80x90 inches) and 2 pillowcases (20x26 inches). Queen: 1 Comforter (90x90 inches) and 2 pillowcases (20x26 inches). Excellent choice for your guest rooms and master room. Modern gifts for teens, boys, girls, men or women who are yearning for the outer space.
description: Imagine yourself sleeping wrapped in a mysterious galaxy and that's how you'll feel sleeping with this bedding comforter set!
Why Choosing Paxrac Galaxy Comforter Set? 5 Compelling Reasons for You.
: The comforter is designed in a mysterious galaxy. Imagine entering a sweet dream with a beautiful galaxy every day and waking up every morning to see the universe, what a joy it is!
: The bedding comforter set is made of 100% soft microfiber. This lightweight comforter will not put downward pressure on your body. It can be used for all-season.

: Benefit from high-quality classic stitching design, comforter keeps well even after many washes, no need to worry about mess-up trouble after wash. Great Workmanship prevents the filling from moving around or clumping together.
: Manufactured with advanced reactive printing technology, offer it rich colors that hold its vivid over time, never fade.
: Paxrac pillowcase is a hidden envelope opening. More convenient to use. There are no zippers or buttons, so you don't need to worry about damage during cleaning.

Because of vacuum compression for transportation, before using it please remember to make it fluffy again. You can expose it to the sunlight and tap it gently, then it will fluff up nicely after hours. Or, washing the comforter to reduce wrinkles and puff the comforter.
